metadata.videoTitle: How to Improve Oral Health & Its Critical Role in Brain & Body Health

paragraphList.text_en: Oral health is a critical aspect of overall health as it is linked to both brain and bodily health in the short and long term. Unfortunately, oral health is often overlooked when considering mental and physical well-being. The text introduces a quiz to categorize individuals based on their oral care habits. Category one consists of individuals who brush and floss daily, use additional oral care products, and are attentive to their teeth's appearance and cleanliness. Category two includes those who have a more relaxed approach to oral care, such as brushing once a day or infrequent flossing and dental visits. The third category comprises individuals who are extremely diligent about all aspects of oral health, including the microbiome and overall health of the mouth.
paragraphList.text_zh: 口腔健康是整体健康的一个关键方面，因为它在短期和长期内都与大脑和身体健康有关。不幸的是，在考虑身心健康时，口腔健康往往被忽视。本文介绍了一个测试，根据个人口腔护理习惯对其进行分类。第一类包括每天刷牙和使用牙线，使用额外的口腔护理产品，并注意牙齿的外观和清洁度的个人。第二类包括那些对口腔护理更放松的人，例如每天刷牙一次或不经常使用牙线和牙科就诊。第三类包括对口腔健康的各个方面都非常勤奋的人，包括微生物组和口腔的整体健康。

paragraphList.text_en: Most people fall into categories one or two, where they may be maintaining their teeth's appearance but could be unknowingly disrupting their oral health. While individuals in category one may be doing beneficial things for their oral health, there are additional practices they could adopt to improve overall bodily health. On the other hand, individuals in category two may be neglecting both oral and bodily health. Interestingly, some individuals in category two who do not focus much on teeth appearance may have a healthier oral microbiome, showcasing a unique aspect of oral health.
paragraphList.text_zh: 大多数人属于第一类或第二类，他们可能保持了牙齿的外观，但可能在不知不觉中扰乱了口腔健康。虽然第一类人可能对他们的口腔健康有益，但他们可以采取其他措施来改善整体身体健康。另一方面，第二类人可能忽视了口腔和身体健康。有趣的是，第二类中一些不太关注牙齿外观的人可能拥有更健康的口腔微生物组，这展示了口腔健康的独特方面。

paragraphList.text_en: The text emphasizes the importance of educating individuals on proper oral care practices to enhance overall health. By consulting with multiple dentists, the information presented in the text highlights the consensus on best practices for oral and dental health. Regardless of the category individuals fall into, there are accessible and scientifically backed practices that can improve oral health significantly. The shared recommendations from various dental professionals indicate a common ground in promoting good oral hygiene practices.
paragraphList.text_zh: 该文本强调了对个人进行适当口腔护理实践教育以增强整体健康的重要性。通过咨询多位牙医，文本中提供的信息突出了对口腔和牙齿健康最佳实践的共识。无论个人属于哪一类，都有可获得的、有科学依据的做法可以显著改善口腔健康。来自不同牙科专业人士的共同建议表明，在促进良好口腔卫生习惯方面存在共同点。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, the text underscores the significance of oral health in maintaining overall well-being and encourages individuals to reassess their oral care habits. By understanding the interconnectedness of oral health with broader health outcomes, individuals can make informed decisions to improve their oral hygiene practices. Adopting recommended oral care practices can lead to not only healthier teeth and gums but also contribute to better overall mental and physical health.
paragraphList.text_zh: 最后，本文强调了口腔健康在保持整体健康方面的重要性，并鼓励个人重新评估他们的口腔护理习惯。通过了解口腔健康与更广泛的健康结果的相互联系，个人可以做出明智的决定来改善他们的口腔卫生习惯。采用推荐的口腔护理方法不仅可以使牙齿和牙龈更健康，而且有助于改善整体身心健康。
